name: Carpe Deal 'Em
description: Carpe Deal 'Em is a life simulator / card game hybrid, with elements from the visual novel / CYOA genres.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Better Processor: AMD Turion TL-60 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 8400M GS or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 @ 3.00GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
